verses.verse: In the first <S%H2298><s%> year <S%H8140><s%> of Belshazzar <S%H1113><s%> king <S%H4430><s%> of Babylon <S%H895><s%> Daniel <S%H1841><s%> had <S%H2370><s%> a dream <S%H2493><s%> and visions <S%H2376><s%> of his head <S%H7217><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> his bed: <S%H4903><s%> then <S%H116><s%> he wrote <S%H3790><s%> the dream <S%H2493><s%> and told <S%H560><s%> the sum <S%H7217><s%> of the matters. <S%H4406><s%>

Daniel <S%H1841><s%> spoke <S%H6032><s%> and said, <S%H560><s%> I saw <S%H2370><s%> in my vision <S%H2376><s%> by <S%H5974><s%> night, <S%H3916><s%> and, <S%H718><s%> behold, the four <S%H703><s%> winds <S%H7308><s%> of the sky <S%H8065><s%> broke <S%H1519><s%> forth on the great <S%H7229><s%> sea. <S%H3221><s%>

Four <S%H703><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> animals <S%H2423><s%> came up <S%H5559><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the sea, <S%H3221><s%> diverse <S%H8133><s%> one <S%H1668><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> another. <S%H1668><s%>

The first <S%H6933><s%> was like a lion, <S%H744><s%> and had eagle <S%H5403><s%>'s wings: <S%H1611><s%> I saw <S%H1934><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> its wings <S%H1611><s%> were plucked, <S%H4804><s%> and it was lifted up <S%H5191><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> the earth, <S%H772><s%> and made to stand <S%H6966><s%> on <S%H5922><s%> two feet <S%H7271><s%> as a man; <S%H606><s%> and a man <S%H606><s%>'s heart <S%H3825><s%> was given to it. <S%H3052><s%>

Behold, <S%H718><s%> another <S%H317><s%> animal, <S%H2423><s%> a second, <S%H8578><s%> like <S%H1821><s%> a bear; <S%H1678><s%> and it was raised up <S%H6966><s%> on one <S%H2298><s%> side, <S%H7859><s%> and three <S%H8532><s%> ribs <S%H5967><s%> were in its mouth <S%H6433><s%> between <S%H997><s%> its teeth: <S%H8128><s%> and they said <S%H560><s%> thus <S%H3652><s%> to it, <S%H6966><s%> Arise, devour <S%H399><s%> much <S%H7690><s%> flesh. <S%H1321><s%>

After <S%H870><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> I saw, <S%H1934><s%> and behold, <S%H718><s%> another, <S%H317><s%> like a leopard, <S%H5245><s%> which had on <S%H5922><s%> its back <S%H1355><s%> four <S%H703><s%> wings <S%H1611><s%> of a bird; <S%H5776><s%> the animal <S%H2423><s%> had also four <S%H703><s%> heads; <S%H7217><s%> and dominion <S%H7985><s%> was given to it. <S%H3052><s%>

After <S%H870><s%> this <S%H1836><s%> I saw <S%H1934><s%> in the night <S%H3916><s%> visions, <S%H2376><s%> and, <S%H718><s%> behold, a fourth <S%H7244><s%> animal, <S%H2423><s%> awesome <S%H574><s%> and powerful, <S%H8624><s%> and strong exceedingly; <S%H3493><s%> and it had great <S%H7260><s%> iron <S%H6523><s%> teeth; <S%H8128><s%> it devoured <S%H399><s%> and broke in pieces, <S%H1855><s%> and stamped <S%H7512><s%> the residue <S%H7606><s%> with its <S%H1932><s%> feet: <S%H7271><s%> and it <S%H1932><s%> was diverse <S%H8133><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the animals <S%H2423><s%> that were before <S%H6925><s%> it; <S%H6236><s%> and it had ten horns. <S%H7162><s%>

I considered <S%H1934><s%> the horns, <S%H7162><s%> and behold, <S%H431><s%> there came up <S%H5559><s%> among <S%H997><s%> them another <S%H317><s%> horn, <S%H7162><s%> a little <S%H2192><s%> one, <S%H6925><s%> before which three <S%H8532><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> the first <S%H6933><s%> horns <S%H7162><s%> were plucked up by the roots: <S%H6132><s%> and behold, <S%H431><s%> in this <S%H1668><s%> horn <S%H7162><s%> were eyes <S%H5870><s%> like the eyes <S%H5870><s%> of a man, <S%H606><s%> and a mouth <S%H6433><s%> speaking <S%H4449><s%> great things. <S%H7260><s%>

I saw <S%H1934><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> thrones <S%H3764><s%> were placed, <S%H7412><s%> and one who was ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days <S%H3118><s%> sat: <S%H3488><s%> his clothing <S%H3831><s%> was white <S%H2358><s%> as snow, <S%H8517><s%> and the hair <S%H8177><s%> of his head <S%H7217><s%> like pure <S%H5343><s%> wool; <S%H6015><s%> his throne <S%H3764><s%> was fiery <S%H5135><s%> flames, <S%H7631><s%> and its wheels <S%H1535><s%> burning <S%H1815><s%> fire. <S%H5135><s%>

A fiery <S%H5135><s%> stream <S%H5103><s%> issued <S%H5047><s%> and came forth <S%H5312><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him: <S%H506><s%> thousands of thousands <S%H506><s%> ministered <S%H8120><s%> to him, <S%H7240><s%> and ten thousand times ten thousand <S%H7240><s%> stood <S%H6966><s%> before <S%H6925><s%> him: <S%H1780><s%> the judgment was set, <S%H3488><s%> and the books <S%H5609><s%> were opened. <S%H6606><s%>

I saw <S%H1934><s%> at that time <S%H116><s%> because <S%H4481><s%> of the voice <S%H7032><s%> of the great <S%H7260><s%> words <S%H4406><s%> which the horn <S%H7162><s%> spoke; <S%H4449><s%> I saw <S%H1934><s%> even until <S%H5705><s%> the animal <S%H2423><s%> was slain, <S%H6992><s%> and its body <S%H1655><s%> destroyed, <S%H7><s%> and it was given <S%H3052><s%> to be burned <S%H3346><s%> with fire. <S%H785><s%>

As for the rest <S%H7606><s%> of the animals, <S%H2423><s%> their dominion <S%H7985><s%> was taken away: <S%H5709><s%> yet their lives <S%H2417><s%> were prolonged <S%H3052><s%> for <S%H5705><s%> a season <S%H2166><s%> and a time. <S%H5732><s%>

I saw <S%H1934><s%> in the night <S%H3916><s%> visions, <S%H2376><s%> and behold, <S%H718><s%> there came <S%H858><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the clouds <S%H6050><s%> of the sky <S%H8065><s%> one like a son <S%H1247><s%> of man, <S%H606><s%> and he came <S%H4291><s%> even to <S%H5705><s%> the ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days, <S%H3118><s%> and they brought him near <S%H7127><s%> before him. <S%H6925><s%>

There was given <S%H3052><s%> him dominion, <S%H7985><s%> and glory, <S%H3367><s%> and a kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> that all <S%H3606><s%> the peoples, <S%H5972><s%> nations, <S%H524><s%> and languages <S%H3961><s%> should serve <S%H6399><s%> him: <S%H7985><s%> his dominion is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> dominion, <S%H7985><s%> which shall not <S%H3809><s%> pass away, <S%H5709><s%> and his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> that which shall not <S%H3809><s%> be destroyed. <S%H2255><s%>

As for me, <S%H576><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> my spirit <S%H7308><s%> was grieved <S%H3735><s%> in the midst <S%H1459><s%> of my body, <S%H5085><s%> and the visions <S%H2376><s%> of my head <S%H7217><s%> troubled me. <S%H927><s%>

I came near <S%H7127><s%> to <S%H5922><s%> one <S%H2298><s%> of <S%H4481><s%> those who stood by, <S%H6966><s%> and asked <S%H1156><s%> him <S%H4481><s%> the truth <S%H3330><s%> concerning all <S%H3606><s%> this. <S%H1836><s%> So he told <S%H560><s%> me, <S%H3046><s%> and made me know the interpretation <S%H6591><s%> of the things. <S%H4406><s%>

These <S%H459><s%> great <S%H7260><s%> animals, <S%H2423><s%> which <S%H581><s%> are four, <S%H703><s%> are four <S%H703><s%> kings, <S%H4430><s%> who shall arise <S%H6966><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> the earth. <S%H772><s%>

But the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the Most High <S%H5946><s%> shall receive <S%H6902><s%> the kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and possess <S%H2631><s%> the kingdom <S%H4437><s%> <S%H99999><s%> forever, <S%H5957><s%> even <S%H5705><s%> forever <S%H5957><s%> and ever. <S%H5957><s%>

Then <S%H116><s%> I desired <S%H6634><s%> to know the truth <S%H3321><s%> concerning <S%H5922><s%> the fourth <S%H7244><s%> animal, <S%H2423><s%> which was <S%H1934><s%> diverse <S%H8133><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> of them, <S%H3493><s%> exceedingly terrible, <S%H1763><s%> whose teeth <S%H8128><s%> were of iron, <S%H6523><s%> and its nails <S%H2953><s%> of brass; <S%H5174><s%> which devoured, <S%H399><s%> broke in pieces, <S%H1855><s%> and stamped <S%H7512><s%> the residue <S%H7606><s%> with its feet; <S%H7271><s%>

and concerning the ten <S%H6236><s%> horns <S%H7162><s%> that were on its head, <S%H7217><s%> and the other <S%H317><s%> horn which came up, <S%H5559><s%> and before <S%H4481><s%> which three <S%H8532><s%> fell, <S%H5308><s%> even that <S%H1797><s%> horn <S%H7162><s%> that <S%H1797><s%> had eyes, <S%H5870><s%> and a mouth <S%H6433><s%> that spoke <S%H4449><s%> great things, <S%H7260><s%> whose look <S%H2376><s%> was more <S%H4481><s%> stout <S%H7229><s%> than <S%H4481><s%> its fellows. <S%H2273><s%>
I saw, <S%H1934><s%> and the same <S%H1797><s%> horn <S%H7162><s%> made <S%H5648><s%> war <S%H7129><s%> with <S%H5974><s%> the saints, <S%H6922><s%> and prevailed against them; <S%H3202><s%>

until <S%H5705><s%> the ancient <S%H6268><s%> of days <S%H3118><s%> came, <S%H858><s%> and judgment <S%H1780><s%> was given <S%H3052><s%> to the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the Most High, <S%H5946><s%> and the time <S%H2166><s%> came <S%H4291><s%> that the saints <S%H6922><s%> possessed <S%H2631><s%> the kingdom. <S%H4437><s%>

Thus <S%H3652><s%> he said, <S%H560><s%> The fourth <S%H7244><s%> animal <S%H2423><s%> shall be <S%H1934><s%> a fourth <S%H7244><s%> kingdom <S%H4437><s%> on earth, <S%H772><s%> which shall be diverse <S%H8133><s%> from <S%H4481><s%> all <S%H3606><s%> the kingdoms, <S%H4437><s%> and shall devour <S%H399><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> earth, <S%H772><s%> and shall tread it down, <S%H1759><s%> and break it in pieces. <S%H1855><s%>

As for the ten <S%H6236><s%> horns, <S%H7162><s%> out of <S%H4481><s%> this kingdom <S%H4437><s%> shall ten <S%H6236><s%> kings <S%H4430><s%> arise: <S%H6966><s%> and another <S%H321><s%> shall arise <S%H6966><s%> after <S%H311><s%> them; <S%H8133><s%> and he shall be diverse from <S%H4481><s%> the former, <S%H6933><s%> and he shall put down <S%H8214><s%> three <S%H8532><s%> kings. <S%H4430><s%>

He shall speak <S%H4449><s%> words <S%H4406><s%> against <S%H6655><s%> the Most High, <S%H5943><s%> and shall wear out <S%H1080><s%> the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the Most High; <S%H5946><s%> and he shall think <S%H5452><s%> to change <S%H8133><s%> the times <S%H2166><s%> and the law; <S%H1882><s%> and they shall be given <S%H3052><s%> into his hand <S%H3028><s%> until <S%H5705><s%> a time <S%H5732><s%> and times <S%H5732><s%> and half <S%H6387><s%> a time. <S%H5732><s%>

But the judgment <S%H1780><s%> shall be set, <S%H3488><s%> and they shall take away <S%H5709><s%> his dominion, <S%H7985><s%> to consume <S%H8046><s%> and to destroy <S%H7><s%> it to <S%H5705><s%> the end. <S%H5491><s%>

The kingdom <S%H4437><s%> and the dominion, <S%H7985><s%> and the greatness <S%H7238><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4437><s%> under <S%H8460><s%> the whole <S%H3606><s%> sky, <S%H8065><s%> shall be given <S%H3052><s%> to the people <S%H5972><s%> of the saints <S%H6922><s%> of the Most High: <S%H5946><s%> his kingdom <S%H4437><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5957><s%> kingdom, <S%H4437><s%> and all <S%H3606><s%> dominions <S%H7985><s%> shall serve <S%H6399><s%> and obey him. <S%H8086><s%>

Here <S%H5705><s%> is the end <S%H5491><s%> of the matter. <S%H4406><s%> As for me, <S%H576><s%> Daniel, <S%H1841><s%> my thoughts much <S%H7690><s%> troubled <S%H927><s%> me, <S%H5922><s%> and my face <S%H2122><s%> was changed <S%H8133><s%> in me: <S%H5922><s%> but I kept <S%H5202><s%> the matter <S%H4406><s%> in my heart. <S%H3821><s%>
